pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, August 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, August 26, 2017:

Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Niagara College Teaching Winery. A media availability will follow.

Niagara College Teaching Winery
135 Taylor Road
Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity and open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive at the front entrance no later than 9:15 a.m.

Hamilton, Ontario

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit McMaster University

McMaster University
1280 Main Street West
Hamilton, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive at the Cootes Drive entrance no later than 12:30 p.m. and register upon arrival with Michelle Donovan (905-512-8548‎)

Stoney Creek, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Winona Peach Festival

1328 Barton Street
Stoney Creek, ON

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

Scarborough, Ontario

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Tamilfest and will deliver remarks.

Markham Road at Turbina Avenue
Scarborough, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at ‎the Passmore Avenue entrance no later than 4:30 p.m.
